metadata.Title: CVE-2018-8036 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
In Apache PDFBox 1.8.0 to 1.8.14 and 2.0.0RC1 to 2.0.10, a carefully crafted (or fuzzed) file can trigger an infinite loop which leads to an out of memory exception in Apache PDFBox's AFMParser.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-8036` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libfontbox-java - 1:1.8.16-2~18.04
libjempbox-java - 1:1.8.16-2~18.04
libpdfbox-java - 1:1.8.16-2~18.04
No subscription required

libfontbox2-java - 2.0.13-2~18.04
libpdfbox2-java - 2.0.13-2~18.04
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libpdfbox-java package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.8.16-2~18.04').
libpdfbox2-java package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0.13-2~18.04').
